long: Meaning: an "action" (good or bad); generally, a "transaction"; abstractly, "activity"; by implication, a "product" (specifically, a "poem") or (generally) "property".  Usage: act, art,   bakemeat, business, deed, do(-ing), labor, thing made, ware of making, occupation, thing offered, operation, possession, Ã— well, (handy-, needle-, net-) work(ing, -manship), wrought.  Source: from "H6213";
